content.question: ​The function <math alttext="r"><mi>r</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="r open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator x minus 3 over denominator x plus 5 end fraction"><mi>r</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac></math>. What are all solutions to <math alttext="r open parentheses x close parentheses greater than 0"><mi>r</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="negative 5 less than x less than 3"><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>3</mn></math>
​<math alttext="x less than negative 5"><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></math> and <math alttext="x greater than 3"><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mn>3</mn></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="x less than negative 5"><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></math> and <math alttext="x greater than 3"><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mn>3</mn></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
